    • Uses of ClusteringAlg in images.mining.clustering

      Subclasses of ClusteringAlg in images.mining.clustering 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  IntraImageKMeansAdapted
      This class implements an adapted K-means approach for performing intra-image SIFT feature clustering, as described in the paper "Two pass k-means algorithm for finding SIFT clusters in an image" in 2010 at the Slovenian KDD conference which is a part of the larger Information Society multi-conference.
      class  IntraImageKMeansAdaptedScale
      This class implements an adapted K-means approach for performing intra-image SIFT feature clustering, as described in the paper "Two pass k-means algorithm for finding SIFT clusters in an image" in 2010 at the Slovenian KDD conference which is a part of the larger Information Society multi-conference.
      class  IntraImageKMeansWeighted
      This class implements an adapted K-means approach for performing intra-image SIFT feature clustering, as described in the paper "Two pass k-means algorithm for finding SIFT clusters in an image" in 2010 at the Slovenian KDD conference which is a part of the larger Information Society multi-conference.

    • Uses of ClusteringAlg in learning.unsupervised

      Methods in learning.unsupervised that return ClusteringAlg 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ClusteringAlg ClustererFactory.getClustererForName(java.lang.String cName, DataSet dset, int k, float[][] distMat, NeighborSetFinder nsf, float[][] trainingKernelMat, NeighborSetFinder nsfKernel, int nClust, CombinedMetric cmet, Kernel ker)
      This is how initial clusterer instances are currently generated, as they require initial parametrizations and doing all of that via reflection in every single case might be somewhat non-trivial in the general case - though it is certainly preferable to having the algorithm names hardcoded inside.
      Methods in learning.unsupervised that return types with arguments of type ClusteringAlg 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<ClusteringAlg> ClustererFactory.getAllClusterers(DataSet dset, int k, float[][] distMat, NeighborSetFinder nsf, float[][] trainingKernelMat, NeighborSetFinder nsfKernel, int nClust, CombinedMetric cmet, Kernel ker)
      This method generates all supported clusterers representing different algorithms, for the given data.

    • Uses of ClusteringAlg in learning.unsupervised.evaluation

      Methods in learning.unsupervised.evaluation that return ClusteringAlg 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClusteringAlg BatchClusteringTester.getClustererForName(java.lang.String cName, DataSet dset, int index, int k, float[][] distMat, NeighborSetFinder nsf, float[][] trainingKernelMat, NeighborSetFinder nsfKernel, int nClust, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> algorithmParametrization)
      This is how initial clusterer instances are currently generated, as they require initial parametrizations and doing all of that via reflection in every single case might be somewhat non-trivial in the general case - though it is certainly preferable to having the algorithm names hardcoded inside.

    • Uses of ClusteringAlg in learning.unsupervised.methods

      Subclasses of ClusteringAlg in learning.unsupervised.methods 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DBScan
      This class implements the well-known density based DBScan algorithm first proposed in the following paper: Martin Ester, Hans-Peter Kriegel, JÃ¶rg Sander, Xiaowei Xu (1996).
      class  FastKMeans
      A fast K-means implementation described in: Alsabti, Khaled, Sanjay Ranka, and Vineet Singh.
      class  FastKMeansPlusPlus
      A fast K-means implementation described in: Alsabti, Khaled, Sanjay Ranka, and Vineet Singh.
      class  GHPC
      Global Hubness-proportional Clustering that was analyzed in the paper titled "The Role of Hubness in Clustering High-dimensional Data", which was presented at PAKDD in 2011.
      class  GHPKM
      Global Hubness-proportional K-means that was analyzed in the following paper: Nenad Tomasev, Milos Radovanovic, Dunja Mladenic and Mirjana Ivanovic: The Role of Hubness in Clustering High-dimensional Data, IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering , Vol.
      class  GKH
      Global K-hubs Clustering algorithm that was analyzed in the paper titled "The Role of Hubness in Clustering High-dimensional Data", which was presented at PAKDD in 2011.
      class  HarmonicKMeans
      Clusterer that performs harmonic K-means.
      class  KernelGHPKM
      A kernelized version of the GHPKM algorithm, described in the following chapter: "Hubness-proportional clustering of High-dimensional Data" by Nenad Tomasev, Milos Radovanovic, Dunja Mladenic and Mirjana Ivanovic, published in "Partitional Clustering Algorithms" book in 2014.
      class  KernelKMeans
      This class implements the kernel K-means algorithm, a kernelized version of the well-known partitional clustering approach.
      class  KMeans
      Clusterer that performs K-means.
      class  KMeansPlusPlus
      Clusterer that performs K-means++.
      class  KMedoids
      Clusterer that performs K-medoids.
      class  KMedoidsPlusPlus
      Clusterer that performs K-medoids.
      class  LHPC
      Local Hubness Proportional Clustering that was analyzed in the paper titled "The Role of Hubness in Clustering High-dimensional Data", which was presented at PAKDD in 2011.
      class  LKH
      This class implements the Local K-Hubs algorithm that was analyzed in the paper titled "The Role of Hubness in Clustering High-dimensional Data", which was presented at PAKDD in 2011.
